Episodes.Title: Attack of the Juvies
Episodes.Plot: The hunt for an elusive hog nicknamed "Big Nasty" preoccupies Gary; while Julie and Christie help a fellow hog hunter.

Episodes.Title: Big Nasty
Episodes.Plot: A hog problem at a yacht club is handled; and hogs tear up an airport runway.

Episodes.Title: Episode 3
Episodes.Plot: Golf course with an aggressive hog issue; hogs in an expectant mother's backyard.

Episodes.Title: Episode 4
Episodes.Plot: Gary chases hogs at a yacht club while Paul chases an attractive hostess; Julie and Christie visit an airstrip where hogs are creating a potential danger.

Episodes.Title: Episode 5
Episodes.Plot: Gary and the girls bet on who will be able to catch a large hog terrorizing a local rancher.

Episodes.Title: Episode 6
Episodes.Plot: Julie and Christie help a cook prepare for an annual festival; huge hogs threaten a harvest; a family is afraid of feral hogs in the nearby woods.

Episodes.Title: Episode 7
Episodes.Plot: Residents of an RV park are terrorized by an agggressive boar; the women and Christie's uncle Randy work to push a pack of hogs off a local ranch.

Episodes.Title: The Last Stand
Episodes.Plot: Julie and Christie team up with a colleague to catch a "phantom hog"; Gary and the local sheriff take action to eliminate hogs from the highway.
